import React from 'react' import './tabs.css' import ins from '../../utils/images/insignia.avif' import dx from '../../utils/images/4dx.webp' import NowShowing from '../NowShowing/NowShowing' import ComingSoon from '../ComingSoon/ComingSoon'; import Experiences from '../Experiences/Experiences' import Trailers from '../Trailers/Trailers' import Offers from '../Offers/Offers' import SwiperSlides from '../Swiper/SwiperSlides' import {useRef} from 'react'; const Tabs = () => { const comingRef = useRef(null); const experienceRef = useRef(null); const trailerRef = useRef(null); const OfferRef = useRef(null); const handleScroll = (Ref) => { Ref.current?.scrollIntoView({behavior: 'smooth'}); }; return (
  • Now Showing
  • handleScroll(comingRef)}> Coming Soon
  • handleScroll(experienceRef)}> Experiences
  • handleScroll(trailerRef)}> Trailers
  • handleScroll(OfferRef)}> Offers

) } export default Tabs
